name: Fauna-tastic!
description:
For HTML5 play here: https://biyectivo.com/games/fauna-tastic/. For Windows, download below.

Description

Faunta-tastic! is a falling blocks (er, animals) puzzle game. Fill the board with the corresponding animals with the correct rotation. Do so before the poor lads fall into the spikes!

There's only one small detail though - you can't rotate the animals directly! Thankfully, you have a set of friendly planes that will shoot friendly bullets at them to manipulate them!

Instructions

  • The animals are controlled with LEFT and RIGHT arrow keys.
  • Use your SPACE key to switch between the three planes:
    • The BLUE plane shoots bullets that rotate the animal.
    • The YELLOW plane will transform an animal into another animal.
    • The RED plane will invert gravity for that animal.
  • Use the UP key to shoot bullets with the selected plane!
  • Use the DOWN key to accelerate the falling animal downwards.

Losing

  • You lose when you get three strikes. A strike is scored each time a poor little animal falls into the spikes :(

Scoring

  • +100 points per correct animal placed in the board.
  • -5 points for each animal transformation.
  • -10 points if the animal escapes towards the sky.

Advance a level when you successfully place all animals in the board. Each level will become increasingly harder (faster and bigger board)!

Tips

  1. The BLUE plane will revert gravity back to normal.
  2. The YELLOW plane does not alter gravity.
